question: Mike collected 50 stickers in total. He traded some of his stickers with Lisa. Now he has 20 stickers left. How many stickers did he trade with Lisa?
Emily baked 40 cookies for the party. She shared some of her cookies with her friends. After sharing, she has 15 cookies remaining. How many cookies did she share?
Mia discovered 50 marbles in her backyard. She gave Alex some of her marbles. Now she has 20 marbles left. How many marbles did she give to Alex?
Tom collected 40 stickers in a contest. He shared some of his stickers with Lisa. Currently, he has 15 stickers remaining. How many stickers did he share with Lisa?
